price: আৰু নিশ্চয় আমি ইয়াক নিদৰ্শনৰূপে ৰাখি দিছোঁ; এতেকে আছেনে কোনোবা উপদেশ গ্ৰহণকাৰী?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
